meanings.definition: To apply paste to something in advance.
meanings.sent1: I will prepaste the paper before we start the project.
meanings.sent2: She always prepastes the labels on the jars for efficiency.
meanings.sent3: The teacher joked that she would prepaste the answers on the test for us.
meanings.sent4: His meticulous nature led him to prepaste the entire presentation for the meeting.
meanings.sent5: Remember to prepaste the stamps on the envelopes to save time later.

meanings.definition: Paste that is applied in advance.
meanings.sent1: The prepaste on the labels made the task easier.
meanings.sent2: I always keep a tube of prepaste in my desk for emergencies.
meanings.sent3: The prepaste on the bandages helped them stick better.
meanings.sent4: The prepaste on the wallpaper made the installation process smoother.
meanings.sent5: Make sure to use enough prepaste on the back of the photo for it to stick properly.
